title: npmx Enhances Metadata Visibility and Testing

topics.title: Package Metadata & UI
topics.summary: Expanded package detail pages with new badges for module formats (ESM/CJS), TypeScript types, and Node.js engine constraints. Additionally, implemented 'outdated' indicators for dependencies and added infinite scroll to organization and user package lists to match search behavior.

topics.title: Testing Infrastructure Optimization
topics.summary: Significantly reduced test suite noise by resolving 'sharp' dependency conflicts and excluding top-level async/await patterns from Vitest coverage that were causing parsing errors. Implemented pnpm 'onlyBuiltDeps' pinning to secure the build environment against unauthorized binary execution.

topics.title: Core Logic Validation
topics.summary: Introduced comprehensive unit tests for server-side utilities, improving the reliability and maintainability of pure utility functions within the npmx core.
